about_the_game:
As an engineer stranded in an alien star system, scavenge parts and build equipment to fight your way back home. Work with (or against) the laws of physics in MEANWHILE IN SECTOR 80 to turn trash into survival.


Everything you find in SECTOR 80 is battered and abandoned. You must work with what you have: there are no fabricators, nano-scale 3D printers, or factories here. You'll need both skill and creativity to make functioning equipment from space junk.

In MEANWHILE IN SECTOR 80, everything is a physical object with mass, heat, and stored energy. Every part you find might be key to your next invention. A damaged battery might be a critical power source in a pinch, or perhaps an effective explosive in the right hands!


SECTOR 80 is an uncharted system that no human has ever returned from. Scour worlds with familiar and alien biomes to uncover what it is that makes this system so dangerous.


Long-term survival in the hostile system of SECTOR 80 is impossible. With no prospect of rescue, work towards repairing and activating an incomplete sling gate at the center of the solar system to make it home alive.

Key Features

  • Hand-crafted solar system filled with hostile enemies to fight and scavenge
  • In-depth physics simulation of the world and everything around you
  • Build everything you need to survive out of discarded junk
